meanings: [Noun] (sports) An instance of spinning 180 degrees, so that one is facing in the opposite direction.
[Noun] (figuratively,by extension) A complete change of direction or opinion.
Adjective, Adverb 180도의[로] , 완전한[히] , 정반대의[로], 완전히 역(逆)의[으로].
